title: Rudy Giuliani Self Owns, #MeToo: The Talk Show 5.3.18
itunes:title: Rudy Giuliani Self Owns, #MeToo: The Talk Show 5.3.18
description:
In episode 140, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Ramin Nazer to discuss new sexual harassment allegations against Charlie Rose and his possible new #metoo show, Rudy Giuliani spilling the beans about Trump paying Michael Cohen back for Stormy Daniels hush money, how Michael Cohen owes a ton of tax-money over taxi scams, the Koch brothers getting up to their usual shady shenanigans, the Karate Kid revival coming to YouTube, & more! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
